'''The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] for {{Quest|The Rhythm that Leads to the Gloomy Path}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Floating Hydro Fungus*2;Whirling Cryo Fungus;Whirling Electro Fungus;Stretchy Geo Fungus;Stretchy Pyro Fungus}}
# Pick up [[Primeval Rosin]] (1/3)
# Play the [[Vintage Lyre]] in front of the nearby [[Gloomy Path]]
# Defeat enemies (optional) {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*3}}
# Complete the [[Valaya|Dendro ring]] puzzle using the nearby [[Auspicious Branch]]
# Pick up Primeval Rosin (2/3)
# Defeat enemies for [[Common Chest]] (optional) {{Enemy List|Stretchy Anemo Fungus;Stretchy Geo Fungus;Stretchy Pyro Fungus}}
# At the Y-junction:
#* Go left (west) for a [[Common Chest]] (optional)
#* Go right to proceed onwards
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Whirling Cryo Fungus*3}}
# Play the Vintage Lyre in front of the nearby Gloomy Path
# Touch the flower to create a bridge
# Attack the vines to destroy the barrier
# Pick up Primeval Rosin (3/3)
# Touch the flower and use the [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s to go up
# Unseal the yellow barrier (requires all 3 Primeval Rosins)
# Defeat enemies 
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*2;Whirling Electro Fungus*2}}
#** {{Enemy|Grounded Hydroshroom|text=Cast Nightmare &mdash; The Shadow of Corrosion}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Floating Dendro Fungus*4}}
#** {{Enemy|Grounded Hydroshroom|text=Cast Nightmare}} &times;2
# Exit domain
